alert.note: Alert for Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations; Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 7:16PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Natrona and southeastern Johnson Counties through 800 PM MDT... At 715 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles east of Red Wall to 18 miles north of Independence Rock to near Muddy Gap. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Independence Rock, Midwest, Edgerton and Emigrant Gap. This includes Interstate 25 between mile markers 201 and 233. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations; Southeast Johnson County
